posts.content:
Anyone ever thought of doing a championship for the BWA?

similar to what you would find the VWDRC and OFFDRC doing?

I know it probably wont be as active as the VWDRC, but it might be another option some members with higher times (16s +) to appear on a leader board.

Also, there are probably quite a few people that have the potential to run sub 18's in their van, that probably dont enter into the BWA as they wouldnt get in the top 20?

Any way... just a thought... might add a bit of a competitive edge to everything? Maybe do heads up championship with/against the USB's?

Im just getting into this at the moments, so dont really know how everything works/how you like to run everything...

Anywho... what do you all think?

Peace!
nice idea
